You dropped a coin, hoping something good will happen.
Hmmm, a place to get stronger you say?\!
Well, I think the outskirts of this holy city of
\c[2]Lighthaven Keep\c[0] is a good place to start.\!
You do realize that I'm in front of you, right?\!
Why did you even look to your back?
Wow that's cool!\! Can you, like, burn undead and stuff?
Whaa?\! Only priests can do that?\!
Anyway, I know you already know about this stuff but...\!
I heard the \c[10]Eden Crystal\c[0] is getting stronger!
You seriously don't know?!\! Well, no bother, I'll tell
Many centuries ago, the 4 factions are in war.\!
This war goes on for many centuries until an oracle by
the name of \c[1]Elaine\c[0] from the \c[2]Fallen Empire\c[0], told the
whole nation that the true evil that feeds on the
raging war is the \c[10]Eden Crystal\c[0] itself!\!
Well, the 4 factions are friends now.\!
And you, my \c[17]Crusader\c[0] friend has a job to do.\!
The \c[10]Eden Crystal\c[0] is very strong!\! Too strong, in fact.\!
Well, that's your problem anyway, since you are a
But don't worry, I'm rooting for you!
Can I get an autograph, please?
Woah, really?!\! Thank you very much, brave \c[17]Crusader\c[0]!
I have a test tomorrow at school.\! That's sucks...\!
Well, to refresh my memories, can you stay a while?\!
Let me tell you the whole story of the dark war age.
I don't think I have the time.
Many centuries ago, the dark war age starts.\! There are
First is \c[1]Vaelyn Calvelista\c[0], the Great \c[17]Crusader\c[0].\! She
was the one representing the \c[2]Lighthaven Keep\c[0]!\!
She is so cool.\! Some said she lacks emotions, but her
heart is so pure and kind, people really likes her.
the \c[2]Fallen Empire\c[0] faction.\! He is known for his ancient
technique \c[10]Fury\c[0]!\! I heard that technique is so powerful
\c[1]Zero\c[0] is the protector of the \c[2]Ancient Forest\c[0].\! Legend
says that he usually spends his time alone.\! He is very
good with blades and archery!\! He doesn't usually go all
out in a fight, but when he does, it's all over.
And finally \c[1]Akhnekith\c[0].\! He is scary, I don't like him.\!
He is the Dark Mage of \c[2]Darkshore Monolith\c[0].\! They don't
tell me this in school but, I know that he hurts
himself when attacking to boost his power.\! That's bad!
I think I am going to pass.\!
I don't think I have the time.
I think I'll try to remember by myself.
